content.p: Dr Daniel Schoch Dr Daniel Schoch presented his research paper, Generalised Mean-Risk Preferences at the 16th Conference on the Foundations of Utility and Risk on 2 July 2014. The event, hosted by the Erasmus School of Economics, was held in Rotterdam. Dr Saumik Paul Dr Teo Wing Leong telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8253 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8019
